casebody.data:
NOREX PETROLEUM LIMITED, Appellant,
v.
Leonard BLAVATNIK, et al., Respondents, et al., Defendants. No. 2017-861. Court of Appeals of New York. Nov. 20, 2017.

Motion for leave to appeal denied with one hundred dollars costs and necessary reproduction disbursements.

Judges FAHEY and FEINMAN took no part.
